charges.charge_description: 21:846=CD.F CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUB-SELL,DISTRIBUTE,OR DISPENSE COCAINE HYDROCHLORIDE (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft committed to custody of Bureau of Prisons for term of 240 months on each of counts 1, 2,3,4, and 5 and a term of 24 months of counts 6, concurrent. Deft placed on supervised release for term of 10 years on counts 1,2,3,4 and 5 and a term of 1 year on count 6 concurrent. (1s)
Counts dismissed pursuant to case proceeding on superseding indictment. (1)

Deft committed to custody of Bureau of Prisons for term of 240 months on each of counts 1, 2,3,4, and 5 and a term of 24 months of counts 6, concurrent. Deft placed on supervised release for term of 10 years on counts 1,2,3,4 and 5 and a term of 1 year on count 6 concurrent. (2s)
Counts dismissed pursuant to case proceeding on superseding indictment. (2)

Deft committed to custody of Bureau of Prisons for a term of 240 months on each of counts 1,2,3,4, and 5, and a term of 24 months on count 6, concurrent. Deft placed on supervised release for term of 10 years on count 1,2,3,4, and 5, and a term of 1 year on count 6 concurrent. (3s)

Deft committed to custody of Bureau of Prisons for term of 240 months on each of counts 1, 2,3,4, and 5 and a term of 24 months on count 6, concurrent. Deft placed on supervised release for term of 10 years on 1,2,3,4, and 5, and a term of 1 year on count 6, concurrent. (4s)

Deft committed to custody of Bureau of Prisons for term of 240 months on each of counts 1, 2,3,4, and 5, and a term of 24 months on count 6, concurrent. Deft placed on supervised release for term of 10 years on counts 1,2,3,4, and 5 and a term of 1 year on count 6, concurrent. (5s)

Deft committed to custody of Bureau of Prisons for term of 240 months on each of counts 1, 2,3,4, and 5, and a term of 24 months on count 6, concurrent. Deft placed on supervised release for term of 10 years on count 1,2,3,4, and 5 and a term of 1 year on count 6, concurrent. (6s)
